library.name: A Comprehensive Bibliography on Syriac Studies

bib: Budge, Ernest A. Wallis. “Syriac Amulets.” In Amulets and Superstitions: The Original Texts with Translations and Descriptions of a Long Series of Egyptian, Sumerian, Assyrian, Hebrew, Christian, Gnostic and Muslim Amulets and Talismans and Magical Figures, with Chapters on the Evil Eye, the Origin of the Amulet, the Pentagon, the Swăstika, the Cross (Pagan and Christian), the Properties of Stones, Rings, Divination, Numbers, the Ḳabbâlâh, Ancient Astrology, Etc., edited by Idem, 272–82. London: Oxford University Press, 1930.
